title: SpinTop - Mystery Stories - Berlin Nights - RaBBiT
description:
Mystery Stories - Berlin Nights


Berlin - what a city! New York star journalist Michelle Deanfield instantly falls in love with this historical metropolis. Having barely arrived, she learns of a spectacular find in Berlin's underworld. A secret machine from World War II could solve the world's energy problem!

But a mysterious sect and ruthless ex-secret agent from former communist East Germany are also after the machine. Help Michelle explore 20 fantastic hidden object locations in historic Berlin and solve mini-games to find the lost machine.
